verses.name: Mark 14:52
verses.text: And he left the linen cloth, and fled from them naked.

verses.name: Mark 14:53
verses.text: And they led Jesus away to the high priest: and with him were assembled all the chief priests and the elders and the scribes.

verses.name: Mark 14:54
verses.text: And Peter followed him afar off, even into the palace of the high priest: and he sat with the servants, and warmed himself at the fire.

verses.name: Mark 14:55
verses.text: And the chief priests and all the council sought for witness against Jesus to put him to death; and found none.

verses.name: Mark 14:56
verses.text: For many bare false witness against him, but their witness agreed not together.
